title: @Reav3. Are there any plans for a Nocturne visual touch-up?
body: I know you (or maybe Meddler, don't quote me on that) mentioned before that Noc is well off the VGU list, and that he probably won't get much work during a Diver Class Update, but are there plans to fix up his particles, tail, and ability icons? He's only got the two skins that are 'modern' looking (Cursed Revenant and Eternum), and I was just curious if he might get looked at for some small-scope visual work. Sort of like Morgana did last year?

replies.body: I think that while he's not a high priority for a VGU today he likely will be sometime in the future.
